722410.name: Fallen Kingdom
722410.description:
Someday any kingdom comes to an end. Most often this is due to wars, but what if it happens because of magic?
It is a question of one kingdom, whose king was cursed by an evil shaman. All would be nothing, but our hero is the brother of that very king. What to do, save a brother or seek a shaman? In this world, you choose what you do.
Game process:
- 20+ locations;
- 10+ different kinds of enemies;
- 1 story and 2+ minor quests;
- Battles in the style of classical jrpg.
